div.h1: Severe Storms Possible Across the South; Flooding Possible Across the East
div.p: A cold front pushing out of the Central U.S. will bring strong to severe thunderstorms to the South today, and the potential for flooding from the Appalachians to Northeast through Thursday. Meanwhile, the early season heat wave across the Desert Southwest will continue, with Excessive Heat Warnings in effect for much of the region. Read More >
